title: Melbourne Breakfast
description: Loose Leaf - Smooth blend of bold, malty black tea and rich velvety vanilla.

title: English Breakfast
description: Loose Leaf - Robust, coppery Sri Lankan tea with brisk, bold flavours

title: French Earl
description: Tea Bags - Sweet fruits, rose, sunflower and hibiscus, with a touch of bergamot to finish.

title: Gorgeous Geisha
description: Tea Bags - Smooth green tea with strawberries and lush hints of cream.

title: Lemon Ginger
description: Tea Bags - Fresh, bright and zesty lemongras with the warming spice of ginger.

title: Tummy Tea
description: Tea Bags - Calendula, fennel, peppermint, and liquorice root.

title: Sleep Tight
description: Tea Bags - Lemon balm, lavender, jasmine and rose to help you wind down at sundown.

title: Chai Tea
description: Loose Leaf - Fragrant cinnamon, cardamom, ginger and a strong clove finish.
